1.name: Split
1.description: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

2.name: Suicide Squad
2.description: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

3.name: X-Men: Apocalypse
3.description: In the 1980s the X-Men must defeat an ancient all-powerful mutant, En Sabah Nur, who intends to thrive through bringing destruction to the world.

4.name: Captain America: Civil War
4.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

5.name: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
5.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

6.name: Deadpool
6.description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

7.name: Me Before You
7.description: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

8.name: Passengers
8.description: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

9.name: The Invisible Guest
9.description: While the clock is ticking, with the aid of a witness preparation expert, a successful entrepreneur accused of murder has less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defence.

10.name: Moana
10.description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

11.name: Doctor Strange
11.description: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

12.name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
12.description: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

13.name: The Girl on the Train
13.description: A divorcee becomes entangled in a missing persons investigation that promises to send shockwaves throughout her life.

14.name: The Magnificent Seven
14.description: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

15.name: Sing
15.description: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

16.name: Rogue One
16.description: The daughter of an Imperial scientist joins the Rebel Alliance in a risky move to steal the Death Star plans.

17.name: La La Land
17.description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

18.name: Lion
18.description: A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia. 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.

19.name: The Jungle Book
19.description: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther Bagheera and free-spirited bear Baloo.

20.name: Hacksaw Ridge
20.description: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people, and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

21.name: Nocturnal Animals
21.description: A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.

22.name: Arrival
22.description: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

23.name: The Nice Guys
23.description: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

24.name: Lady Macbeth
24.description: In 19th-century rural England, a young bride who has been sold into marriage discovers an unstoppable desire within herself as she enters into an affair with a worker on her estate.

25.name: The Accountant
25.description: As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client, the Treasury Department closes in on his activities, and the body count starts to rise.

26.name: Moonlight
26.description: A chronicle of the childhood, adolescence and burgeoning adulthood of a young, African-American, gay man growing up in a rough neighborhood of Miami.

27.name: The Neon Demon
27.description: An aspiring model, Jesse, is new to Los Angeles. However, her beauty and youth, which generate intense fascination and jealousy within the fashion industry, may prove themselves sinister.

28.name: Hell or High Water
28.description: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

29.name: Silence
29.description: In the 17th century, two Portuguese Jesuit priests travel to Japan in an attempt to locate their mentor, who is rumored to have committed apostasy, and to propagate Catholicism.

30.name: The Legend of Tarzan
30.description: Tarzan, having acclimated to life in London, is called back to his former home in the jungle to investigate the activities at a mining encampment.

31.name: The Secret Life of Pets
31.description: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

32.name: Hidden Figures
32.description: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

33.name: The Edge of Seventeen
33.description: High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

34.name: Your Name.
34.description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

35.name: Ghostbusters
35.description: Following a ghost invasion of Manhattan, paranormal enthusiasts Erin Gilbert and Abby Yates, nuclear engineer Jillian Holtzmann, and subway worker Patty Tolan band together to stop the otherworldly threat.

36.name: War Dogs
36.description: Loosely based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a three hundred million dollar contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.

37.name: Now You See Me 2
37.description: The Four Horsemen resurface, and are forcibly recruited by a tech genius to pull off their most impossible heist yet.

38.name: Zootopia
38.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

39.name: The Conjuring 2
39.description: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising 4 children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

40.name: Don't Breathe
40.description: Hoping to walk away with a massive fortune, a trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who isn't as helpless as he seems.

41.name: Snowden
41.description: The NSA's illegal surveillance techniques are leaked to the public by one of the agency's employees, Edward Snowden, in the form of thousands of classified documents distributed to the press.

42.name: A Cure for Wellness
42.description: An ambitious young executive is sent to retrieve his company's CEO from an idyllic but mysterious "wellness center" at a remote location in the Swiss Alps, but soon suspects that the spa's treatments are not what they seem.

43.name: Lights Out
43.description: Rebecca must unlock the terror behind her little brother's experiences that once tested her sanity, bringing her face to face with a supernatural spirit attached to their mother.

44.name: Star Trek Beyond
44.description: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.

45.name: Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children
45.description: When Jacob discovers clues to a mystery that stretches across time, he finds Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children. But the danger deepens after he gets to know the residents and learns about their special powers.

46.name: Gods of Egypt
46.description: Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypt's throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.

47.name: Jason Bourne
47.description: The CIA's most dangerous former operative is drawn out of hiding to uncover more explosive truths about his past.

48.name: The Handmaiden
48.description: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

49.name: The Founder
49.description: The story of Ray Kroc, a salesman who turned two brothers' innovative fast food eatery, McDonald's, into the biggest restaurant business in the world, with a combination of ambition, persistence, and ruthlessness.

50.name: The Huntsman: Winter's War
50.description: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna.
